verses.verse: By the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> we <S%H3427>sat<s%> down, <S%H1571>yes,<s%> we <S%H1058>wept,<s%> when we <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
We <S%H8518>hanged<s%> our <S%H3658>harps<s%> on the <S%H6155>willows<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> thereof.

For <S%H8033>there<s%> they that <S%H7617>carried<s%> us away <S%H7617>captive<s%> <S%H7592>required<s%> of us a <S%H1697>song;<s%> <S%H7892><s%> and they that <S%H8437>wasted<s%> us required of us <S%H8057>mirth,<s%> saying, <S%H7891>Sing<s%> us one of the <S%H7892>songs<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> I <S%H7911>forget<s%> you, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> let my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> her cunning.

<S%H518>If<s%> I do not <S%H2142>remember<s%> you, let my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>stick<s%> to the <S%H2441>roof<s%> of my <S%H2441>mouth;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> I <S%H5927>prefer<s%> not <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> my <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H8057>joy.<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> who <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6168>Raze<s%> it, <S%H6168>raze<s%> it, even to the <S%H3247>foundation<s%> thereof.
O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> who are to be <S%H7703>destroyed;<s%> <S%H835>happy<s%> shall he be, that <S%H7999>rewards<s%> you as you have <S%H1580>served<s%> us.
<S%H835>Happy<s%> shall he be, that <S%H270>takes<s%> and <S%H5310>dashes<s%> your <S%H5768>little<s%> ones <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5553>stones.<s%>
